div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 245 Zacynthus, 1904 (1182) Burial: c. 175-150 B.C. (T) Contents: 172 AR Heracleia Lucaniae: 1 diob. Larissa: 1 ob. Locri Opuntii: 61 triob. Chalcis: 1 dr. Achaean League: 14 triob. Aegae: 1 triob. Elis: 86 triob.? Arcadia: 4 triob. Tegea: 1 trihemiob. Rhodes: 1 dr. Selge: 1 ob. Disposition: Athens 86 (all except Elis) To be published by M. Oeconomides
